name: zerofox
label: ZeroFox
description: ZeroFox Platform combines advanced AI-driven analysis to detect complex threats on the surface, deep and dark web, fully managed services with threat analysts that become an extension of your team, and automated remediation to effectively disrupt threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the username to access the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Specify the username to access the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password to access the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Specify the password to access the ZeroFox server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get IP Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the IP address submitted to determine if it is malicious based on the IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: ip

operations.title: Get Domain Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the domain submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the domain name you have specified.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the domain based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: domain

operations.title: Get Email Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the email address submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the email address you have specified.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.description: Specify the email address based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: email

operations.title: Get FileHash Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the hash submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the hash you have specified.

parameters.title: File Hash
parameters.description: Specify the value of the file hash based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of the file hash based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: hash

operations.title: Get Exploits Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves a registered exploits from ZeroFox based on the created after you have specified.

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.description: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.tooltip: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: created_after

operations.title: Get Alerts List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all alerts from ZeroFox based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Number
parameters.description: Specify the account number of the social network based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account number of the social network based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: account

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.description: Select the type of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Account Information, Entity Discovery Content, Entity Discovery Profile, Impersonating Account, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Account Information, Entity Discovery Content, Entity Discovery Profile, Impersonating Account, etc.
parameters.name: alert_type

parameters.title: Assignee Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the user assigned to an alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the user assigned to an alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: assignee

parameters.title: Entity ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: entity

parameters.title: Term ID of Entity
parameters.description: Specify the term ID of the entity based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox
parameters.tooltip: Specify the term ID of the entity based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox
parameters.name: entity_term

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.description: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.tooltip: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: min_timestamp

parameters.title: Created Before
parameters.description: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created before the specified timestamp.
parameters.tooltip: Select the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created before the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: max_timestamp

parameters.title: Last Modified
parameters.description: Specify the amount of time (in seconds) since an alert was last modified based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the amount of time (in seconds) since an alert was last modified based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: last_modified

parameters.title: Network Names
parameters.description: Specify the names of the network based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the names of the network based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: network

parameters.title: Risk Rating
parameters.description: Select the risk rating of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Info, Low, Medium, High, or Critical
parameters.tooltip: Select the risk rating of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Info, Low, Medium, High, or Critical
parameters.name: risk_rating

parameters.title: Sort Direction
parameters.description: Select the sort direction to sort alerts retrieved from ZeroFox. Possible values are Ascending or Descending
parameters.tooltip: Select the sort direction to sort alerts retrieved from ZeroFox. Possible values are Ascending or Descending
parameters.name: sort_direction

parameters.title: Sort Field
parameters.description: Select the sort field based on which you want to sort alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Alert ID, Alert Status, Alert Type, Assigned User, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Select the sort field based on which you want to sort alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Alert ID, Alert Status, Alert Type, Assigned User, etc.
parameters.name: sort_field

parameters.title: Alert Status
parameters.description: Select the status of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Open, Closed, Takedown Accepted, Takedown Denied, Takedown Requested, or White Listed
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the alert based on which you want to retrieve alerts from ZeroFox. Possible values are Open, Closed, Takedown Accepted, Takedown Denied, Takedown Requested, or White Listed
parameters.name: status

parameters.title: Escalated
parameters.description: If true, returns only escalated alerts from ZeroFox. By default, it set as True.
parameters.tooltip: If true, returns only escalated alerts from ZeroFox. By default, it set as True.
parameters.name: escalated

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from ZeroFox. By default, this option is set to 10, and you can set a maximum value of 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from ZeroFox.By default, this option is set to 10, and you can set a maximum value of 100.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set as 0
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set as 0
parameters.name: offset

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve a alerts from ZeroFox.
parameters.description: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve a alerts from ZeroFox.

operations.title: Get Alert Details
operations.description: Retrieves a specific alert details from ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to retrieve details from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

operations.title: Assign Alert to User
operations.description: Assigns a alert to a specific user in ZeroFox based on the alert ID and user name you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to assign alert to specific user in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to assign alert to specific user in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

parameters.title: User Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the user based on which you want to assign alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the user based on which you want to assign alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: username

operations.title: Open Alert
operations.description: Opens an specific alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to open specific alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to open specific alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

operations.title: Close Alert
operations.description: Closed an specific alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to close specific alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to close specific alert in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

operations.title: Request Alert Takedown
operations.description: Requests a takedown of a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to takedown alert request in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to takedown alert request in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

operations.title: Cancel Alert Takedown
operations.description: Cancels a takedown of a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to cancel alert takedown in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to cancel alert takedown in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

operations.title: Modify Alert Tags
operations.description: Adds tags to and or removes tags from a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID, action, and tags you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to modify the alert tags in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to modify the alert tags in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

parameters.title: Action
parameters.description: Specify the action based on which you want to add or remove the alert tags in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the action based on which you want to add or remove the alert tags in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: action

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.description: Specify the tags based on which you want to modify in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the tags based on which you want to modify in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: tags_list

operations.title: Modify Alert Notes
operations.description: Modify the notes from a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID and notes you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to modify the alert notes in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert based on which you want to modify the alert notes in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: alert_id

parameters.title: Notes
parameters.description: Specify the notes based on which you want to modify in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the notes based on which you want to modify in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: notes

operations.title: Create Entity
operations.description: Creates a new entity associated with the company of the authorized user in ZeroFox based on the entity name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Entity Name
parameters.description: Specify the entity name based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the entity name based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the policy based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the policy based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: policy

parameters.title: Strict Name Matching
parameters.description: Select the type of string matching used for comparing entity names to impersonator names.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of string matching used for comparing entity names to impersonator names.
parameters.name: strict_name_matching

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated list of string tags based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated list of string tags based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: tags

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the organization associated with the entity based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the organization associated with the entity based on which you want to create entity in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: organization

operations.title: Get Entity List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all entities associated with the company of the authorized user from ZeroFox based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.description: Specify the email address based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: email_address

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity group based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity group based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: group

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity label based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity label based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: label

parameters.title: Network ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the network based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the network based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: network

parameters.title: Network Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the network based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the network based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: networks

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity policy based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity policy based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: policy

parameters.title: Type ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity type based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity type based on which you want to retrieve entity from ZeroFox.
parameters.name: type

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Specify the page from which you want this operation to return results based on the page size.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page from which you want this operation to return results based on the page size.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get Entity Types List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all entity types from ZeroFox.

operations.title: Get Policy Types List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all policy types from ZeroFox.

operations.title: Submit Threat
operations.description: Submit threats into the alert registry for disruption in ZeroFox based on the entity ID, content, content type, infringement type, and notes you have specified.

parameters.title: Entity ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: entity_id

parameters.title: Content
parameters.description: Specify the content to be considered a threat based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the content to be considered a threat based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: source

parameters.title: Content Type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the content acting as a threat based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox. Possible values are Email, IP, Domain, URL, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the content acting as a threat based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox. Possible values are Email, IP, Domain, URL, etc.
parameters.name: alert_type

parameters.title: Infringement Type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the infringement the submitted threat represents based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox. Possible values are Phishing, Malware, Rogue App, Impersonation, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the infringement the submitted threat represents based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox. Possible values are Phishing, Malware, Rogue App, Impersonation, etc.
parameters.name: violation

parameters.title: Notes
parameters.description: Specify the notes to include in submission based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the notes to include in submission based on which you want to submit threat in ZeroFox.
parameters.name: notes
